Event.Message: Windows Agent is starting in %3 mode. Agent version %1, running on Windows %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProductVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WindowsVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="AgentMode" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Policy was changed in the Console:
%1

Event.Message:
Policy was changed with override commands:
%1

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to register with management: %1 (%2). Retrying in %3 seconds.

Event.Message: Threat remediation: Failed to rename file %1 to %2. Error: %3

Event.Message: Threat remediation: Failed to restore file %1 to timestamp %2 because no snapshots were found up to the desired period.

Event.Message: Threat remediation: Failed to restore file %1 to timestamp %2 because it is being used by another process.

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RegistryKeyPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: BlueKeep exploitation attempt detected from: %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IP" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Resizing the VSS diff area on %2 was blocked. The existing diff area has %3 used bytes and %4 allocated bytes. The requested new diff area maximum was %5 bytes.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeNameLength"/> <data name="OldDiffAreaUsed" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="OldDiffAreaAllocated" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="NewDiffAreaMaximum" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> </template>

Event.Message: Blocked %5 connection. Rule Id: %9 Rule Name: %10 PID: %3 Remote Address: %1:%2, FQDN: %8. Application Name :%4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RemoteAddress" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Port" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AppId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PacketDirection" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FilterId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="LayerId" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="Fqdn" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RuleId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RuleName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Unable to handle configuration change, dropping the configuration
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: UI storage reached maximum allowed file size
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: UI storage read error %2 "%1"
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

Event.Message: UI storage write error %2 "%1"
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

Event.Message: UI storage is corrupted and will be deleted.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Error deleting corrupted UI storage.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Remote script orchestrator: script %1 execution completed. Start time: %2, duration: %3 milliseconds, exit status: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ScriptName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="StartTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="Duration" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ExitCode" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: File %1 was detected as a malicious driver when attempting to load it (Malicious Driver Type: %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FilePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="MaliciousDriverType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: SentinelCTL command of type "%1" was executed - result was: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="CommandType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Result" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Anti-tampering was activated.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Anti-tampering was deactivated.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Agent upgrade was initiated. (%1 -> %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="OldVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NewVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Windows Agent is shutting down.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Sentinel process has crashed. Dump file path: "%1".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DumpPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Dump file was deleted, as dump limit of %1 was reached. Dump file path: "%2".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DumpFileLimit" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DumpPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The agent has successfully connected to the SentinelOne console (%1).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ConsoleURL" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The agent received a "%1" command from console
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="CommandType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Entering disable mode by command.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Exiting disable mode.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>
<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="CommSdkMessage" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
